title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Mon Mar 5, 2018 | 7:42am   
Chinese President Xi Jinping leaves after the opening session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing. REUTERS/Damir Sagolj Reuters / Saturday, March 03, 2018 Chinese President Xi Jinping leaves after the opening session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing. REUTERS/Damir Sagolj Close 1 / 24 
Oscar winners Sam Rockwell, Frances McDormand, Allison Janney and Gary Oldman (L to R) pose backstage. REUTERS/Mike Blake Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Oscar winners Sam Rockwell, Frances McDormand, Allison Janney and Gary Oldman (L to R) pose backstage. REUTERS/Mike Blake Close 
Jennifer Lawrence wears Christian Dior. REUTERS/Carlo Allegri Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Jennifer Lawrence wears Christian Dior. REUTERS/Carlo Allegri Close 3 / 24 
5-Star Movement leader Luigi Di Maio waves as he leaves after casting his vote at a polling station in Pomigliano d'Arco, Italy. REUTERS/Ciro De Luca Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 5-Star Movement leader Luigi Di Maio waves as he leaves after casting his vote at a polling station in Pomigliano d'Arco, Italy. REUTERS/Ciro De Luca Close 
  fighters are seen in Rajo,   Sunday, March 04, 2018   fighters are seen in Rajo,   5 / 24 
Mats Pettersson's lead dogs wait at the start line during the ceremonial start of the Iditarod dog sled race in Anchorage, Alaska. REUTERS/Mark Meyer Reuters / Saturday, March 03, 2018 Mats Pettersson's lead dogs wait at the start line during the ceremonial start of the Iditarod dog sled race in Anchorage, Alaska. REUTERS/Mark Meyer Close 6 / 24 
Relatives of Palestinian farmer Mohamad Abu Jamea, mourn during his funeral in Khan Younis, in the southern Gaza Strip. REUTERS/Suhaib Salem Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Relatives of Palestinian farmer Mohamad Abu Jamea, mourn during his funeral in Khan Younis, in the southern Gaza Strip. REUTERS/Suhaib Salem Close 7 / 24 
Frances McDormand asks women in the audience to stand as she accepts the Oscar for Best Actress for "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri." REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Frances McDormand asks women in the audience to stand as she accepts the Oscar for Best Actress for "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri." REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Close 
Andrew Pozzi of Britain wins the men's 60 metres hurdles at the IAAF. REUTERS/Hannah McKay Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Andrew Pozzi of Britain wins the men's 60 metres hurdles at the IAAF. REUTERS/Hannah McKay Close 9 / 24 
Best animated short film - Kobe Bryant reacts while being directed to the photo stage with Glen Keane after winning the Best Short Film (Animated) Award for "Dear Basketball". REUTERS/Mike Blake Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Best animated short film - Kobe Bryant reacts while being directed to the photo stage with Glen Keane after winning the Best Short Film (Animated) Award for "Dear Basketball". REUTERS/Mike Blake Close 10 / 24 
Best Costume Design winner Mark Bridges rides a jet ski with actress Helen Mirren on the back after he won it for the shortest Oscar acceptance speech of 2018. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Best Costume Design winner Mark Bridges rides a jet ski with actress Helen Mirren on the back after he won it for the shortest Oscar acceptance speech of 2018. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Close 
Jordan Peele holds his Oscar for Best Original Screenplay for "Get Out." REUTERS/Mike Blake Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Jordan Peele holds his Oscar for Best Original Screenplay for "Get Out." REUTERS/Mike Blake Close 12 / 24 
People take a dip in the flowing waters of Wawa Dam in Rodriguez, Rizal province, Philippines. REUTERS/Dondi Tawatao Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 People take a dip in the flowing waters of Wawa Dam in Rodriguez, Rizal province, Philippines. REUTERS/Dondi Tawatao Close 
Ashley Judd, Annabella Sciorra and Salma Hayek. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Ashley Judd, Annabella Sciorra and Salma Hayek. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Close 14 / 24 
Russian President Vladimir Putin delivers a speech during a rally to support his bid in the upcoming presidential election at Luzhniki Stadium in Moscow. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov Reuters / Saturday, March 03, 2018 Russian President Vladimir Putin delivers a speech during a rally to support his bid in the upcoming presidential election at Luzhniki Stadium in Moscow. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov Close 15 / 24 
A boy jumps between stacks of sand as he plays in Dhaka, Bangladesh. REUTERS/Mohammad Ponir Hossain Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 A boy jumps between stacks of sand as he plays in Dhaka, Bangladesh. REUTERS/Mohammad Ponir Hossain Close 16 / 24 
Tiffany Haddish (L) and Maya Rudolph take the stage to present the Oscar for Best Documentary Short Subject. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Tiffany Haddish (L) and Maya Rudolph take the stage to present the Oscar for Best Documentary Short Subject. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Close 17 / 24 
Kite boarders and kite skiers compete during a regional snow kiting championship on the ice-covered Yenisei River outside Krasnoyarsk, Russia. REUTERS/Ilya Naymushin Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Kite boarders and kite skiers compete during a regional snow kiting championship on the ice-covered Yenisei River outside Krasnoyarsk, Russia. REUTERS/Ilya Naymushin Close 18 / 24 
A child dressed as a suffragette demonstrates during the March4Women event in central London. REUTERS/Simon Dawson Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 A child dressed as a suffragette demonstrates during the March4Women event in central London. REUTERS/Simon Dawson Close 
Presenter Rita Moreno. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Presenter Rita Moreno. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson Close 20 / 24 
Ivana Spanovic of Serbia in action during the Women's Long Jump Final at the IAAF. REUTERS/Phil Noble Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Ivana Spanovic of Serbia in action during the Women's Long Jump Final at the IAAF. REUTERS/Phil Noble Close 21 / 24 
Relatives of Palestinian farmer Mohamad Abu Jamea, mourn during his funeral in Khan Younis, in the southern Gaza Strip. REUTERS/Suhaib Salem Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Relatives of Palestinian farmer Mohamad Abu Jamea, mourn during his funeral in Khan Younis, in the southern Gaza Strip. REUTERS/Suhaib Salem Close 
Sofia Carson on the red carpet. REUTERS/Carlo Allegri Reuters / Sunday, March 04, 2018 Sofia Carson on the red carpet. REUTERS/Carlo Allegri Close 23 / 24 
Guillermo del Toro with the Best Director Award and the Best Picture Award for "The Shape of Water" REUTERS/Mike Blake Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Guillermo del Toro with the Best Director Award and the Best Picture Award for "The Shape of Water" REUTERS/Mike Blake Close
